laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline platelet count at the time of first delivery was 20,000 giga/l; current platelet count at consultation was 46,000 giga/l; on day of delivery initial platelet count was 36,000 giga/l; repeat platelet count after transfusion was 30,000 giga/l; intraoperative count was 10,000 giga/l; serial counts showed progressive increases: 20,000 giga/l to 31,000 giga/l at 24 h, 42,000 giga/l at 48 h, and 53,000 giga/l at discharge.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Platelet count showed a decrease from 46,000 to 36,000, then to 30,000, further reduced to 10,000 intraoperatively, followed by increases post-delivery.

laboratory_examinations.findings: INR was 1.0 at consultation and 1.02 before the second surgery.
vWF:RCo activity at the time of hospital discharge was 454%.
Factor VIII concentration at discharge was 258%.
